AMS math: align environment

How to align multi-line equations?

Use \begin{align} ... \end{align}. Number lines automatically; add \nonumber or \notag to suppress numbering for a line.

\begin{align}
  a+b &= c \\
  d+e &= f
\end{align}
label: kb

Booktabs: publication-quality tables

How to make high-quality horizontal rules?

Load \usepackage{booktabs} and prefer \toprule, \midrule, \bottomrule. Avoid vertical rules.

\begin{tabular}{l r}
\toprule
Item & Value \\
\midrule
A & 1 \\
B & 2 \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
label: kb

siunitx basics

How to typeset numbers and units?

Use \SI{<num>}{<unit>} for quantities and \si{<unit>} for units. Configure formatting via \sisetup.

\SI{9.81}{\meter\per\second\squared}
label: kb

Geometry: margins

How to set page margins?

Load \usepackage[margin=1in]{geometry} or set top/bottom/left/right explicitly.

\usepackage[margin=1in]{geometry}
label: kb

Hyperref: links and PDF metadata

How to add links and metadata?

Load \usepackage{hyperref}. Set \hypersetup{colorlinks=true, linkcolor=..., citecolor=..., urlcolor=...}. Use \href{url}{text}.

\href{https://example.com}{Example}
label: kb

text:
Cleveref: smart cross-references

How to reference figures, sections, equations automatically?

Load \usepackage{cleveref}. Use \cref{eq:one} or \Cref{fig:plot} to get the correct names and formatting.

See \cref{eq:one} and \Cref{fig:plot}.
label: kb

thmtools + amsthm

How to define theorem-like environments cleanly?

Load amsthm and thmtools. Declare styles and environments with \declaretheorem[style=...]{theorem}.

\declaretheorem[name=Theorem,numberwithin=section]{theorem}
label: kb

mathtools extras

Useful additions to amsmath?

mathtools extends amsmath with fixes and helpers like \coloneqq, \DeclarePairedDelimiter, and matrix shortcuts.

\begin{pmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{pmatrix}
